===Per Level Increase===
Whenever an artifact gains a level the following calculation is applied to its main affix:

<math>\text{AffixValue}_\text{Current} = \text{AffixValue}_\text{Previous} + (\text{AffixValue}_\text{MainBase} \times \text{AffixMultiplier})</math>


The '''AffixMultiplier''' is unique to each specific quality and Main Affix in question, and varies between 0.28 and 0.29.
Also, each attribute is rounded in the UI view.

===Identical Affix Values===
The following Main Affixes share values:
*'''HP%''', '''ATK%''' and '''Elemental DMG%'''.
*'''DEF%''' and '''Physical DMG%'''.

==Minor Affix Theoretical Maximums==
These are theoretical max minor affix values that any artifact can have. This requires the artifact to have the max number of minor affixes possible at level 0 (see [[Loot System/Artifact Drop Distribution#Initial Sub Stat Number Distribution|Initial Minor Affix Number Distribution]]), so that a roll is not "wasted" on a new minor affix, with the minor affix of interest also having the max possible initial value. To obtain the maximum theoretical value, the artifact must then only roll into the minor affix of interest, while also rolling the max possible upgrade value.
